title: Breakingviews - Ukraine war is tectonic shift for global finance: podcast - Reuters.com
content: Breakingviews - Ukraine war is tectonic shift for global finance: podcast  Reuters.com
description: Investor turned anti-corruption campaigner Bill Browder joins Dasha Afanasieva on The Exchange podcast to explain why tougher sanctions from the West, including freezing oligarch assets, threaten Russian President Vladimir Putin’s grip, and cripple the country’s economy.
